productDescription: Do you prefer to carry your bag in your hand, over your shoulder or crossbody? Gadiva offers all options. She is made of leather and finished with stitching and copper-colored fittings. She has a zipper on the top and a zipper on the inside for your keys and cards.

optionalInfo.material: Our bags are made of naturally tanned leather. No chemicals were used during this process.
optionalInfo.fit:
-B38 x H31 x D12 cm 
- zipper at the top
- handle; 23cm
- removable shoulder strap; min 42cm, max 50cm
- 13 ”and 15” laptops and A4 documents fit in it
optionalInfo.production: BAGOA is fairly made in India.
